This file came from the Lego Mindstorm 1.5 Release
C:\Program Files\LEGO MINDSTORMS\firm\Firm0309.lgo

To upload this file, use nqc from Not Quite C, found locally
at ../nqc, or found on the web at

http://www.enteract.com/%7Edbaum/nqc/index.html

The command to run is
nqc -firmware Firm0409.lgo
